issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
To get a model attribute assigned directly to a Label.text we can use something like this <Label text='{title} by {author}' /> this works ok but if the text attribute starts with simple text for example
<Label text='by {author}' /> 
we get an error.

You can use one of the examples presents in http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/Alloy_Data_Binding

h3. Actual Result
This return an error and we can't compile

h3. Expected Result
I expected that I can start the text attribute with some text and put the {attribute} wherever I want
fields.summary: Error adding text before model attribute in using dataCollection
